topic.title: EMS Patient Blood Pressure Organizer - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-112)

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientDiastolicBloodPressure, where its type is EMS Patient Diastolic Blood Pressure
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Diastolic Blood Pressure

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientSystolicBloodPressure, where its type is EMS Patient Systolic Blood Pressure
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Systolic Blood Pressure
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-112)

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientDiastolicBloodPressure, where its type is EMS Patient Diastolic Blood Pressure
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Diastolic Blood Pressure

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientSystolicBloodPressure, where its type is EMS Patient Systolic Blood Pressure
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Systolic Blood Pressure
